attributes.action: Make the school days end at 2:15
attributes.additional_details: I believe the school days should be made shorter as the teachers complain about students being tired so with the extra hour gone it will be able for kids to get home faster and get to bed earlier and it will also give them motivation to go to school

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648774
